mapper.select: select m.name as name, c.mem_card_no, c.card_num as card_num, c.card_company as card_company, c.expire_date from member m, mem_card c where m.id=c.id and m.id=#{userId}
SELECT max(dogeon_pay_no) as dogeon_pay_no FROM chal_dog_pay WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE chal_dog_pay SET cash_receipt_YN='Y' WHERE dogeon_pay_no=#{dogeon_pay_no}
